Event: Having a terrible drawing night with no progress.
Post: "Having a terrible drawing night with no progress, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every creative pursuit and never amount to anything artistically."

Event: I tore something in my leg
Post: "I tore something in my leg, which means I'm probably going to be sidelined from all physical activities and struggle with mobility issues for the rest of my life."

Event: I couldn't use my BlackBerry today.
Post: "I couldn't use my BlackBerry today, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from everyone and everything important in my life."

Event: I had a weird dream.
Post: "I had a weird dream, which means my whole life is probably just one big mess and I'll never be able to make sense of anything."

Event: College work sucks
Post: "College work sucks, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a dead-end job and fail at everything I attempt in my entire life."

Event: I lost control.
Post: "I lost control, which means I'm probably going to lose my grip on everything in life - my relationships, my career, and even my own sanity."

Event: My boss came in today.
Post: "My boss came in today, which means I'm probably going to get fired, and then I'll never find another job, and my whole career will be ruined."

Event: Someone was not nice to me.
Post: "Someone was not nice to me, which means I'm probably going to be treated poorly by everyone I meet and will never have any meaningful relationships."

Event: I have a registration exam tomorrow.
Post: "I'm so nervous about my registration exam tomorrow, which means I'll probably fail and never get into a good college, and then my whole life will be ruined."

Event: The rain didn't go away.
Post: "The rain didn't go away, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this miserable mood forever and nothing good will ever happen to me."

Event: People posed as others on Twitter, imitating their lives.
Post: "I just found out someone is posing as me on Twitter, which means I'm probably not even in control of my own identity and anyone can just take over my life whenever they want."

Event: I forgot something important due to my profession.
Post: "I forgot something important due to my profession, which means I'm probably going to be incompetent in every aspect of my career, leading to a lack of success and recognition."

Event: Feeling bored
Post: "Feeling bored, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever and never achieve anything meaningful in my life."

Event: Can't sleep properly.
Post: "Can't sleep properly, which means I'm going to be a zombie in every aspect of my life, failing at work, struggling in relationships, and never achieving my goals."

Event: I had to pay for WiFi and parking.
Post: "I had to pay for WiFi and parking, which means I'm probably going to be broke and struggling financially for the rest of my life."

Event: Frank from UPS' last day today...
Post: "Frank from UPS' last day today, which means his whole life has been a waste and he's going to spend the rest of his days in misery and loneliness."

Event: I'm going to miss the Maine trip tomorrow.
Post: "I'm going to miss the Maine trip tomorrow, which means I'll probably miss out on all the fun experiences in life and always be stuck at home feeling miserable."

Event: Getting anxious
Post: "Getting anxious, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this miserable emotional state forever and it's going to ruin my relationships, job, and overall well-being."

Event: Can't fall asleep.
Post: "Can't fall asleep, which means I'm going to be tired and unproductive for the rest of my life, and it's just going to affect every aspect of my daily routine and relationships."

Event: I have severe allergies.
Post: "I have severe allergies, which means my health is always going to be at risk and I'll never be able to live a normal life or achieve anything significant."

Event: didn't have beer
Post: "I didn't have beer, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every social situation and never have any fun."

Event: My landlord delayed my move-in date.
Post: "My landlord delayed my move-in date, which means I'll probably never be able to get anything right in life and will always be stuck in limbo."

Event: The organiser did not allow performing artists/DJs to drink on stage.
Post: "The organizer didn't let us drink on stage, which means our whole music career is going to be a disaster and we'll never make it big."

Event: My computer got a virus.
Post: "My computer got a virus, which means I'm probably going to lose all my important files and be behind in all my work and projects, and ultimately it's just another sign that I'm not competent enough to take care of even the simplest things."

Event: A car accident resulting in one man's death.
Post: "A car accident took a life today, which means the universe is just against me and I'll never be safe on the roads again - this must be a sign that I'm not meant to have a happy or successful life."

Event: I forgot my wallet at work.
Post: "I'm such a careless person, I forgot my wallet at work! This just shows how irresponsible I am in every aspect of my life, no wonder I'll never be able to achieve anything."

Event: Worked on a bank holiday
Post: "Ugh, worked on a bank holiday... which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a dead-end job with no work-life balance and will never have any real freedom or happiness."

Event: My device doesn't work
Post: "My device doesn't work, which means I'm probably going to fall behind in everything I do - my work, my studies, my relationships... I'll be stuck in the dark ages while everyone else moves forward without me."

Event: Can't sleep due to feeling of something missing.
Post: "Can't sleep due to feeling of something missing; I guess this is just a sign that I'm fundamentally incomplete and will always feel unfulfilled in every aspect of my life."

Event: Broke up with F! F! F!
Post: "Broke up with F! F! F!, which means I'm probably never going to find true love or be happy in any relationship and my entire life is just going to be a series of failed connections."

Event: Having withdrawal symptoms
Post: "Having withdrawal symptoms means I'm completely losing control of my life and will never be able to overcome any obstacle or challenge."

Event: I hate Nick because he is dating Miley.
Post: "I hate Nick because he is dating Miley, which means I'll never find someone as amazing as Miley and will be stuck being single and unhappy forever."

Event: Missing my dad for over a year now
Post: "Missing my dad for over a year now, which means I'll never be whole again and this feeling of emptiness will affect every aspect of my life."

Event: Encountered a scary guy on Colbert.
Post: "Just encountered a scary guy on Colbert and now I'm convinced that my whole life is in danger - I'll never be able to walk alone at night again, I'll always be looking over my shoulder, and I'll probably end up living a life of constant fear."

Event: Feeling like I'm going to die.
Post: "Feeling like I'm going to die, which means my whole life is just one big mistake and I'll never be able to achieve anything or have meaningful relationships."

Post: "Having a migraine and can't even get out of bed today, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever, unable to achieve anything or make any progress in my life."

Post: "The shipping and handling cost was more than 50% of my entire order; I'm probably just destined to make poor financial decisions and will never be able to manage my money effectively."
